definition: to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: If you eat peaches grown on those trees, you will never die.
sentences.chinese: 如果你吃了那些桃树上结出的桃子，你就能长生不死。

sentences.english: The peach of immortality in Chinese mythology.
sentences.chinese: 神话里的蟠桃具有长生不死的功效。

sentences.english: Men have always dreamed of immortality.
sentences.chinese: 人们总是梦想长生不死。

sentences.english: I said I'd want to spend my lifetime loving you…forsaking the immortal life of your people.
sentences.chinese: 我说我会爱你一生，我愿意放弃精灵长生不死的力量。

sentences.english: Is there no such thing as immortality?

definition: to grow old with unfailing eyes and ears (idiom)
legendary magic potion of immortals/panacea/fig. wonder solution to a problem
to achieve the Dao/to become an immortal
to levitate heavenwards (a Daoist success)/to take off/to soar (of prices)
to levitate heavenwards (a Daoist success)/to take off/to soar (of prices)
Daoist immortal/supernatural entity/(in modern fiction) fairy, elf, leprechaun etc/fig. lighthearted person
to stand aloof/to be detached from/to transcend worldliness/untrammeled/unconventional
